headline: Invesco Short Term Bond Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: We observe that yield spreads between Treasuries and non-Treasury sectors have been tight, which makes our credit underwriting and security selection even more important.

headline: Invesco Core Plus Bond Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Bond yields, though down from their highs, are still at attractive levels compared to the last 10 years, in our view. Read more here.
